libs/openengine/ogre/mouselook.hpp

Go to the documentation of this file.
00001 #ifndef OENGINE_OGRE_MOUSELOOK_H
00002 #define OENGINE_OGRE_MOUSELOOK_H
00003 
00004 /*
00005   A mouse-look class for Ogre. Accepts input events from Mangle::Input
00006   and translates them.
00007 
00008   You can adjust the mouse sensibility and switch to a different
00009   camera. The mouselook class also has an optional wrap protection
00010   that keeps the camera from flipping upside down.
00011 
00012   You can disable the mouse looker at any time by calling
00013   setCamera(NULL), and reenable it by setting the camera back.
00014 
00015   NOTE: The current implementation will ONLY work for native OIS
00016   events.
00017  */
00018 
00019 #include <mangle/input/event.hpp>
00020 
00021 namespace Ogre
00022 {
00023     class Camera;
00024 }
00025 
00026 namespace OEngine {
00027 namespace Render
00028 {
00029   class MouseLookEvent : public Mangle::Input::Event
00030   {
00031     Ogre::Camera* camera;
00032     float sensX, sensY; // Mouse sensibility
00033     bool flipProt;      // Flip protection
00034 
00035   public:
00036     MouseLookEvent(Ogre::Camera *cam=NULL,
00037                    float sX=0.2, float sY=0.2,
00038                    bool prot=true)
00039       : camera(cam)
00040       , sensX(sX)
00041       , sensY(sY)
00042       , flipProt(prot)
00043     {}
00044 
00045     void setCamera(Ogre::Camera *cam)
00046     { camera = cam; }
00047     void setSens(float sX, float sY)
00048     { sensX = sX; sensY = sY; }
00049     void setProt(bool p) { flipProt = p; }
00050 
00051     void event(Type type, int index, const void *p);
00052   };
00053 
00054   typedef boost::shared_ptr<MouseLookEvent> MouseLookEventPtr;
00055 }}
00056 #endif
